title: Season 4, Ep 47 - Princess Ahag
description:
Ahag's mysterious tattoos may hold the secret to whether she's secretly lost royalty.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Usidore: Matt Young

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Ahag: Colleen Doyle

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Matt Young, and Adal Rifai

Post-Production Coordination: Garrett Schultz

Editor: Chris Rathjen

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Theme Music: Andy Poland

Click HERE for tickets for the upcoming live show at Thalia Hall (Chicago, IL) on December 17th.
